title: Why is the merch store in USD?
body:
Absolutely dog. I want to buy something and I have to do conversion crap for it. Like, do you not have a warehouse in Australia? Like, this is just downright nonsense. I am not paying $100 for a hoodie as a baseline, then conversion fees, then shipping fees.

May as well just buy a bootleg version from someone in China for $20.

replies.body:
Supply and demand. Why set up a branch if there isn't enough volume. 

Does that answer your question?
